about_the_game:
Nothing says “Top Floor” quite like an imposing office desk with matching chairs, filing cabinets and potted plants. Well, nothing apart from a towering statue of your robot exec and an exquisite portrait of your face.

Purchase FOUNDRY: Founders Edition Upgrade to complete the FOUNDRY Founders Edition Pack.

Complete your metallic magnate’s executive look with:

Fancy character skin and office decor objects in exclusive mahogany wood, with marble tops and gold inlay trims.

  • Top hat, monocle and tie skin
  • Desk with animated gear design
  • Filing Cabinet
  • Office Chair
  • Couch
  • Coffee Table with animated gear design
  • Potted Plant

Additional items and blocks:
  • Statue
  • Wall Plaque for Employee of the Month (sign text functionality)
  • Gold name plate (sign text functionality)
  • Mahogany wood blocks (2 pattern options)
  • Marble blocks (2 options: white and black marble)
